name: MYCELIUM REALM
description:
"Mycelium Realm" is a whimsical action 2D top-down game where you play as a brave little mushroom on a mission to protect a precious tree and its roots from danger. Your goal is to use your cunning and quick reflexes to defeat waves of incoming pests and obstacle. With a vibrant world full of life and random generated maps every single time you play, Mycelium Realm is a fun and challenging experience for players of all ages. 

Get ready to take on the role of the ultimate guardian and defend your tree from all harm!

ShotOut to these legends: 

-https://thricedotted.itch.io/looptober-2021-variety-pack by Studio Meow Meow

-Procedural Generation of Nuclear  Throne by Six Dot
